name: YAML config nested indentation drift
source: YAML editor normalizes to 2-space but LLM uses 4-space
description: YAML config uses 2-space indent, LLM generates with 4-space
original:
database:
  host: localhost
  port: 5432
  credentials:
    username: admin
    password: secret
  pool:
    min: 5
    max: 20
    idle_timeout: 30s

llm_edit.old_text:
database:
    host: localhost
    port: 5432
    credentials:
        username: admin
        password: secret
    pool:
        min: 5
        max: 20
        idle_timeout: 30s
llm_edit.new_text:
database:

        username: admin
        password: secret
    pool:
        min: 5
        max: 20
        idle_timeout: 30s
    ssl:
        enabled: true
        cert_path: /etc/ssl/db.crt
